page.title: 19WADEBRIDGE TOWN COUNCIL
page.content: The{Wadebridge Town Council}is composed of 15 councillors who are elected for 4 years.{Council Meetings} are held mothly at{The Town Hall}.The town mayor is{Mr. Mike Kendall}and he may attend more than 200 functions during his year of office.This year the mayor met{The Queen Mother}at the Royal Cornwall Show. Income from the rates ammounts to{Â£25,000}with{Â£15,000 from the short stay car park. This money is used to maintain{The {Town Hall}and the{Playing Fields}.The council also maintains other receational areas at{Coronation Park} and{The Jubilee Field}.Many local organisations are given grants. The council has just leased a large area of land by Egloshayle Church to the Camels Rugby Club. It is also seeking estimates to place a foot bridge over the river in memory of Dr. Bailey.
